about_the_game:
Puzzle Girls: Alexa is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swap tiles, in order to complete the pictured artwork.
Featuring artwork from the Dharker Studio game Alexa's Wild Night, including unseen images that didnt make the final game.

This DLC adds a special feature to all levels of the game... A SOLVE button.

For those who absolutely have to see every image completed in every mode, except no substitute. This simple DLC adds a SOLVE button to the top left corner of each puzzle allowing you to quickly solve a puzzle and move onto the next.

content_descriptors.notes:
- Nudity and sexual content images.
- Artwork depicting consensual sex, threesomes, lesbians, outdoor sex and other adult only content.
- Not suitable for watching at work.
- Not suitable for all ages.

All characters depicted in the game are at least 18 years of age or older.

short_description: Puzzle Girls: Alexa is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swap tiles, in order to complete the pictured artwork. This DLC adds a quick solve feature to allow you to progress further if 'stuck'.
